Actions.Name: Roll Over
Actions.Description: The [name] removes itself from the battlefield, then places itself anywhere in 1 space of its original location. Characters inside its area when it returns take 4 piercing damage and are removed from the battlefield, then placed outside its space as close as possible to its original location and shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Peaceful Snore
Actions.Description: All allies of the [name] in range 2 of it can immediately save against all statuses and dash 1. Allies at 25% hp or lower are additionally cured.

Actions.Name: Crimson Rampage
Actions.Effects: Deals maximum damage against stunned characters.

Actions.Name: Headbutt
Actions.Description: A character adjacent to the [name] is shoved 4.

Actions.Name: Gigakaiser
Actions.Description: The [name] rushes 2, then an adjacent character takes [fray] damage and is stunned. Stunned characters must additionally sacrifice 25% of their maximum hp. Characters at 25% hp or lower are instantly defeated.
